translations: 湿粘的；湿冷的（形容词比较级 clammier, 形容词最高级 clammiest, 名词 clamminess, 副词 clammily）

sentences.sentence: His skin felt cold and clammy.
sentences.translation: 他的皮肤摸上去冷冰冰湿乎乎的。

sentences.sentence: My shirt was clammy with sweat.
sentences.translation: 我的衬衣沾满了汗，又粘又湿。

sentences.sentence: Think of the clammy hands you get when you visit the dentist!
sentences.translation: 想一想去看牙医时那双粘湿的手！
